pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.1.5: I have rendered _muñja_-reed and _pabbaja_-reed with the single word “reed”. I am not aware that these two kinds of reed can be distinguished in English.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.40: [Sp.1.344](): _Yathā so asihattho puriso tāseyya, evaṃ tāsesi maṃ selaṃ yācamāno, maṇiṃ yācantoti attho_, “The meaning is that just as that man with sword in hand would cause fear, so the one asking me for the rock, asking for the gem, caused fear.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.1.11: This phrase is not translated in the rule, and so I leave it untranslated here.
